name: Heart Charm - Gold

name: Butterfly Charm - Multi-Color
description: Colorful butterfly charm with enamel details
svg_element: <g><path d="M-3,-2 Q-4,-3 -3,-4 Q-2,-3 -1,-2 Q0,-1 0,0 Q0,-1 1,-2 Q2,-3 3,-4 Q4,-3 3,-2 Q2,-1 1,0 Q2,1 3,2 Q4,3 3,4 Q2,3 1,2 Q0,1 0,0 Q0,1 -1,2 Q-2,3 -3,4 Q-4,3 -3,2 Q-2,1 -1,0 Q-2,-1 -3,-2 Z" fill="url(#butterflyGradient)" stroke="#4B0082" stroke-width="0.2"/><line x1="0" y1="-4" x2="0" y2="4" stroke="#2F4F4F" stroke-width="0.5"/><defs><linearGradient id="butterflyGradient"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FF69B4"/><stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#9370DB"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#00CED1"/></linearGradient></defs></g>
